item.title: Appeals court allows Trump to end temporary protections for migrants from Central America and Nepal
item.description: A federal appeals court is allowing the Trump administration to end temporary protections for 60,000 migrants from Central America and Nepal

item.title: At least 600 CDC employees are getting final termination notices, union says
item.description: At least 600 employees of the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention are receiving permanent termination notices

item.title: Rhode Island prosecutor under review after warning 'you're gonna regret this' during arrest
item.description: A Rhode Island prosecutor is under review after police body camera footage recorded her warning officers that they would regret arresting her
